website_summaries.verdict: With ample features and a 2-in-1 design that converts from an upright to a handheld, this cute toy offers the most play possibilities for the lowest price.
pros: Realistic functions including swirling canister beads and vacuum sounds
"Small vacuum" attaches from base for small pretend messes
Easy for little kids to push
cons: It requires C batteries, which are awkward to replace
Has the tendency to fall over

customer_reviews.title: Awful buzzing noise
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing. I hate it. I hate it SO much. Think about the worst possible pitch an extremely loud, humming machine could make. That's this f***ing thing. If I could turn back time, I'd smack myself in the face for ever buying this d**n thing. That being said, it's really cute to look at and it makes my kids really happy. I guess I'll just have to invest in ear plugs and stronger coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super pretty, my daughter likes the real vacuuming sound it makes, I like that you can take it apart for a hand held vacuum, and I like the little beads that swirl while it is on, but it is def not the best quality, the parts don’t always stay in place the way hey should, but it’s good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This has provided many hours of entertainment for our 1.5 year old son. He got an obsession with vacuums from playing with ones at daycare and we just had to get one for home. He's been playing with this for quite some time and things still seem to be working just fine. Other reviewers state issues with parts coming off easily, but we have only seen this when he decides to slam the vacuum on the floor or it takes a substantial tumble.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: What's the best way to disappoint a child who can't wait to open the package? Don't include any batteries! And that's just what this manufacturer has done. It requires 3 C batters (the short big ones) and you'll have to remember to buy them separately. Question to the manufacturer: Most people have AA and AAA batteries at home. Why not just use one of those types? And if you have to rely on the less popular C batteries that most people don't have, why not include some of those? Really, try to think of your customers sometimes!
customer_reviews.author: Taurus

customer_reviews.title: This is probably her favorite present. It turns on and makes the noise ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for me 2 year old for Christmas who loves copying mommy vaccum. This is probably her favorite present. It turns on and makes the noise for vaccum. It does not actually suck anything up. It also detatches to have a hand held vaccum. Its the perfect size! Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sent to me after someone returnd it broken
customer_reviews.text: I received this just before Christmas and noticed that the zip tie type things used to pack the toy had already been cut and other twist ties used to repackage it. Didn't have time to return and when my granddaughter opened it on Christmas we found that it makes a horrible noise like something is broken inside (likely why someone returned it). In the process the box was torn up so cannot return it. Waste of money and a broken hearted 2 year old for Christmas. Maybe need to rethink buying from Amazon if they just send broken and returned items out as new.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toy vacuum!! Santa brought this for my daughter, and she LOVES it! Very well made, super simple and easy to detach and reattach the hand vacuum. Easy on/off switch, and the sound isn't loud and annoying like a lot of toddler toys... it's more of a light humming/vibrating kind of sound, with little pink and white "dust" balls swirling around. Simply adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't wor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my four year old twin granddaughters for there birthday that was yesterday. Took them out of the box and had to get batteries today. One of them works and the other won't and my son in law already took the box to the trash. If you ever had twins you would know that one of them is upset because they don't have a working sweeper. Is there a way you can replace and I can send this one back in the box I get the new one in?
customer_reviews.author: Mary Baker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stand up own and terrible noise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as my nephew has a different brand. I think it is cute and a good price but unfortunately it is like top heavy and doesn’t stand up on it’s own and the noise when it is on is painful. I think I would probably buy a different brand and pay a bit more for one that stands up own it’s own.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lutkins

customer_reviews.title: My kid doesn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this for my 19 months old daughter as she sees me vacuum the house all the time. However she has no interest playing with it. The middle removable vacuum kept on falling off which is very annoying. The all thing isn’t very sturdy. I would have returned it if the return option is more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia C

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: We love this vacuum cleaner and it’s features. The sound stays on and it’s not too noisy as far as we’re concerned. Also, love the beads moving and the handheld vacuum attachment; stays put where it belongs until you take it off, at least ours does. Since the sound emanates from the handheld unit, that has the sound when using that, as well. We even put our granddaughter’s name on the front with sticky letters! She love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute. My toddler girls fight over it. It makes a vacuuming sound when turned on which becomes annoying. So I may remove the batteries to fix that. Otherwise it stands up on its own, rolls well, and it’s the perfect height for my 1.5 and 3.5yo.
customer_reviews.author: V&K

customer_reviews.title: Came broken DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: ZEROOOOO. Bought this for my niece for her birthday. I put in brand new batteries and it doesn't work!! I put in another pair and it still doesnt work. I would def. Return it but too late birthday happened. I DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK!
customer_reviews.text: This is a RUSSIAN ROULETTE TOY! for some people this toy works and some it doesn't!!!! My daughter was one of the disappointed ones!!! Brand new batteries and switch DOES NOT WORK! We unpackaged toy, added proper batteries, and put toy together fully. Button is a slide up, slide down. Slide up for in position slide down for off. After CONTINUING to slide up and down and up and down, toy finally turned on. She turned it off to play for later. Later came and toy no longer turned on. VERY VERY VERY VERY VERY DISAPPOINTING. Shipping toy back is not a option. BUY TOY AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maloni V

customer_reviews.title: WASTE
customer_reviews.text: We just opened our vacuum, it was a Christmas gift. It was in the box, in a plastic bag. No zip ties, nothing...clearly someone returned it. It doesn’t work at all. The balls don’t move and it doesn’t make a sound. At this point I’m not returning it, my toddler destroyed the box already. She played with it for 5 min and now it’s laying in the floor, probably headed to the trash. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My baby girl always has to have what mama has ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl always has to have what mama has and does what mama is doing so getting her her own vacuum was a must! She loves this and uses the handhold attachment just as much if not more!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Cute, inexpensive, and fun
customer_reviews.text: My young great-granddaughter was delighted when she opened her Christmas gift and found a vacuum cleaner that even sounds like Mommy's. Of course, she was a little disappointed that it didn't actually suck up stuff, but she enjoyed knowing that she could at least pretend she was being useful!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth E Sansom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this toy a few months and it is already broken. Not the plastic that is broken, it won’t come on anymore. This isn’t a toy that is even played with every day so it is not being worn out. I want to return it but the return window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: dixie

customer_reviews.title: Makes Vacuum Sound!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old daughter love this vacuum. We got this as Christmas gift for her. Here it is February and every time she sees me vacuum she runs to get her vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Little

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your little cleaning buddy. It was a Christmas gift for our 3 year old and out of all her gifts this has been zooming non stop. The only thing to know is it takes C batteries so Santa had to run out Christmas Eve and hunt down batteries
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids, but annoying for parents
customer_reviews.text: The batteries required costed almost the price of this thing. Takes 3 C batteries, so that you’re left with a loner C battery cluttering your miscellaneous drawer. The “vacuum” noise will annoy you highly, but seeing you’re little one play with it will melt your heart. Overall buy it for someone else’s kid as a “gift”.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Stremel

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son, he loves vacuums. It's easy to use and isn't too loud. The only down sides are that it doesn't really suck at all and the plastic dirt part has to be in for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible sound and very, very hard to turn on, it also takes special batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Loo

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if unisex colored
customer_reviews.text: My 2 y.o son loves this vacuum. We love how affordable (under $30) it was for all the features it came with. Our only problem is it only comes in pink. The company should really consider other colors or a more unisex color.
customer_reviews.author: michael duncan

customer_reviews.title: My toddler like it
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is 19 months old and she likes to help me clean up in the house. It doesn’t actually vacuum but if it did I’d give this 5 stars It’s cute because it has a detachable hand vacuum that she can play with too
customer_reviews.author: C. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: The noise on this thing is like a fly buzzing in your ear. I hid ours in the closet after only 2 uses. I'm trying to give it away. It's so annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes that it turns into handheld vacuum. She was 20 months when we gave it to her and still plays with it at 2 years old, so that’s a success! Easy to turn on and off. Doesn’t stay in upright position very well though. Falls over easily-I just push it up against the wall and it stays ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lmarsh

customer_reviews.title: Toy Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this vacuum! There is not a day that goes by that she does not use it. It's well made and realistic. I just wish there was actual suction with the upright version, the handheld and the hose attachment; and that came in a different colors. Otherwise a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. Daughter loves vacuuming with her dad. So it works out great. But she does eventually notice her vacuum aint picking up nothing. Lol. But its all in the fun. Sounds great too.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. Keeps my 3-year old busy while I clean. One of the wheels came off the first time she used the toy but I used super glue to fix it. It seems to be working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Guest

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Product checked the boxes for what I was looking for my daughter. Balance of the product is ok, tips over easily and the locking feature to stand up right is on the weaker side, but gets a lot of use. If only it really vacuumed! Batteries hard to locate at first- located on back of dust buster piece
customer_reviews.author: daddy-o

customer_reviews.title: Already doesn’t work after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this April 26. It is now July and it doesn’t work. My granddaughter only played with it a handful of times. It should last more than a few months. I would return it but the window has closed to send it back. I wouldn’t recommend buyinh this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Small but great quality. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is an 8/10. For a girl 3-5, I think it would be great! I was happy with it and would reccomend it! It's a bit on the small side so it fits nicely in a small closet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I got it yrs ago
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old used her birthday money to buy this to "clesn" her playhouse. What a great little toy with many realistic features and teaches responsibility. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L. Crist

customer_reviews.title: My three year old niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my niece on her third birthday (she is always trying to do what her mommy does, including vacuuming), and she loved it. Very cute, and seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: KRHL

customer_reviews.title: It's still intact even after being played with all day every day. Still works.
customer_reviews.text: My twenty month old loves it. She's obsessed with vacuums. Every time I vaccuum she gets hers out an pretend vacuums with me. It came well packaged. It's still intact and she plays with it every day all day. It's a toy so I expected it to kind of fall apart or break by now but it's still intact with nothing broke. She loves it. Thanks❤...Christina from Mi
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 yr old granddaughter loves this "vacuum". received a picture of her cleaning her room with it. It works well and she loves the sound it makes to mimic a real vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves vacuums, she’ll even watch them on YouTube. Funny enough this is one of the vacuums she’d watch. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kendell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: My 18 mo old baby loves this vacuum! It makes noise like a vacuum so he enjoys "cleaning" the house and helping out, played with this toy for probably an hour striaght.
customer_reviews.author: Xelda

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter. She loves it, but I found that it’s difficult for it to stay standing up. In order to keep it upright, it needs to lean against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Pink Childs vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable vacuum cleaner, just the right size for my 2-yr old granddaughter. It has many fun features like sound and easy attachments. She loves it. Also would be great for older toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: carol b.

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a child. She told me she wanted a pink vacuum so I ordered this and she loves it. Super lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Surmanek

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this vacuum cleaner. It makes sounds and little particles move as if she’s actually vacuuming. The little vacuum that comes out it’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Hope the product is better than the box
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell the toy itself is not broken, it’s a birthday present so I didn’t open up the plastic it was wrapped in. But the toy’s box that it arrived in looks like it was danced on, shut in a door or two, taped repeatedly, and drug across the floor. As long as the toy works once I unwrap it, the box doesn’t really matter. Just a bit shocking to receive a product in that condition.
customer_reviews.author: James Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Doesn't even turn on. Cute and appears durable though. But without the noise the kid won't use it so there's not much point.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this! Perfect size for a toddler! I considered one of the brand name, more expensive versions. But for the price I was surprised and pleased with the durability and realistic sounds and visual effects of this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: CarefulShopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yr old daughter received this for Christmas after requesting a similar more expensive vacuum. It requires 3 C batteries and a screw driver to put them in. Only the hand-held part makes the noise when turned on which was a little surprising. There is also a side hose which is cute but really too short to even mimic being useful. Overall, she was very excited to receive this toy and had enjoyed playing with it a couple of times, but won't be something that she uses all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little vacuum I've ever seen! My daughter absolutely loves it and the different ways of using it, like the hand held part or using the tube, it's perfect! She thinks she's really helping me vacuum. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Roach

customer_reviews.title: Need C Batteries doesn’t say on box
customer_reviews.text: It does not tell you on the box that you need c batteries for it. After opening the box on Christmas to find out that you do need batteries looked at box again and it’s in real tiny print that you can hardly read
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: super cute
customer_reviews.text: love that it makes noise and has the dust buster and hose detachable features
customer_reviews.author: crystal kenealy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 18 month old
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this more than anything! Easy to use and very realistic for him!
customer_reviews.author: CLF

customer_reviews.title: Great pretend toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy and it’s a great size! Only problem is that I realized it’s supposed to make noise but it’s not working even after trying different types of batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not put together correct takes 3 batteries one was wired right the other two I had to fix one had two springs the other had none
customer_reviews.author: Robbie stark

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It does not push easily. My child isn’t able to push it because the wheels stick. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole K

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use just pop in the batteries and our granddaughter love this vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Willis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It showed up and the handle had cracked so we couldn't put it together. We ended up just taping it together because my son really wanted to play with it. The hand held vacuum part falls out constantly. And the sound it makes will drive you insane. My son still likes it, but it's definitely not worth over $20.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Get 3 C batterys when ordering
customer_reviews.text: super cute, my daughter always wants to vacuum with me. Super perfect for a 3/4 year old size.
customer_reviews.author: JeTaimeZombies

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 3yr old and her mother says she love it and use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Both grandsons (ages 3 and 1) enjoy helping grandma clean the house. It isn't too noisy, they enjoy removing the hose or DustBuster for "detail work".
customer_reviews.author: LNB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk from the Middle Kingdom.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic and weird sound. Lools good from a distance as a decoration. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, the thing can actually suck up little pieces of paper. I was shocked. The sound is super annoying and noisy. There are times i actually have tho tell her "not right now" bc it's a bit noisy. It's a pretty decent vacuum overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t do much just make a noise, should have had lights
customer_reviews.author: Mrs LaDawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Cute little vacuum that sounds like a real one and just the right height for a 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Monica S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, awful sound
customer_reviews.text: Parents, if you value your sanity, DO NOT PUT BATTERIES IN THIS THING. It’s a great toy and my boys love it, but holy guacamole, that sound is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: neverendingreader

customer_reviews.title: Best pretend vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 15 mnth old for Christmas. She still loves it! It has a button that she can press to "turn it on", a detachable "dust buster", as well as a detachable hose. With full sound the only thing that would make this better is if it actually worked as a real vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Short term fun
customer_reviews.text: The motor on the Vacuum already stopped so the Vacuum no longer turns on and makes noise. My son barely used it as he was gifted it on July 1st. Really disappointed as the return window is already closed. No good!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Marie Chung

customer_reviews.title: Neat ‘lil vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Cute, got for my 1 year old granddaughter, she hasn’t learned how to push it yet but the sound is cute
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My friend’s daughter love it! Sounds great and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa sandoval

customer_reviews.title: So cute and perfect except
customer_reviews.text: the dang wheel keeps popping off! Luckily my 4 year old doesnt care, but it does affect its functionality a bit. Super freaking cute, tho! would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy.. I just wish the on/off button was a little easier for toddlers.. She can’t play with the vacuum function without someone turning it on for her.. other than that she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute little vacuum, nerds 3 c batteries. Not too loud, hose never stays and if you have plush carpet won't stay standing.
customer_reviews.author: Mecebra

customer_reviews.title: Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and granddaughter loved it but was not able to turn off once batteries were put in. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Burke

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The battery compartment will accept three (3) double A batteries. I followed the instructions and installed the batteries. Within a minute the electric motor failed to work. I removed the battery cover and tried to adjust the position of the batteries. One of the three was so hot that I couldn't touch it. This "toy" is sure to cause a fire. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for my one-year-old niece for Christmas and she loves it. It does make noise but it’s not too loud to where it’s annoying. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed was a gift for our daughter. We turned it on and it fried out.
customer_reviews.author: Narrissa Denise McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Cute Vaccuum
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter because she liked to help me vacuum. She likes it, will just go grab it and play sometimes. Came exactly as it looks online. Have not had any issues. Good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift item!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift! The vacuum is very sturdy and well structured, with the perfect weight for a child to carry around and play with. With multiple features, this vacuum is a great gift item.
customer_reviews.author: anneh

customer_reviews.title: My daughters favorite Christmas toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite Christmas toy! It makes an annoying humming sound that she absolutely loves. It works perfectly and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute but that’s it. The sound is extremely loud and the balls inside the vacuum don’t move at all. My 2 year old doesn’t play with it at all
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My sons FAVORITE play vacuum broke so I bought this replacement. They didn’t have a different color but he doesn’t care in the slightest!
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is perfect! Exactly what we were looking for for our 18 month old daughter and almost three year old son. While the noise it makes can be a little annoying, it works great and is super durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Haha Super great product
customer_reviews.text: 1 year old loves it as long as its not on. Haha Super great product, though. I love it. Fits her size, well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: very fun little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: gift for our little 3 year old neighbor. She loved it and "vacuumed" her house and then came and did ours. The sound is realistic
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Adams

customer_reviews.title: Loved vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my 3 yr old girl wanted for christmas
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it , very good quality and daughter like it
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Runs on batteries
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter birthday She loves it. It has a hand vac that detaches Too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Krom

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute & as Described
customer_reviews.text: * Super Fast Shipping * My daughter is so happy * Very Durable * Multifunctional * Love the moving beads/balls when vacuum is on
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Harvell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter she likes it very match
customer_reviews.author: Rina S.

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to a lot of use
customer_reviews.text: As a gift. Child loves it. Uses it everyday. Wish it would really pick up dirt!
customer_reviews.author: Judy K.

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive my granddaughter's vacuum.She is very disappointed .
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the vacuum. I received everything else. My granddaughter really wanted the vacuum together with everything that she received. Other than the vacuum we are all happy with our gifts. because it is already paid for.I hope we will get a replacement Vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Play Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Good play vacuum that was purchased for my 2 yr old. The only thing I don't like about it is that it has to be propped against something, it will not stand up by itself. Other than that it's good & not overly noisy.
customer_reviews.author: TBarber

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My two year old loves this and grabs it when it’s time to vacuum our carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: More than I bargained for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for ky daughters 2nd birthday and she loves it (however, everyone else Hates It!). It works as described and has an annoying "vacuuming sound" that my daughter loves. Waiting for the batteries to die!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 21 months old. She loves it! Pushes it around all day long
customer_reviews.author: Mandy King

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler play vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It sounds like a real vacuum but much softer and my 3 year old granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Coles

customer_reviews.title: It’s way too loud!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works well, holds up well. My kiddo loves having the ability to use the hose and take the hand-held part out and use it. Only things I don’t like about it is it’s way tooooo loud!
customer_reviews.author: Wiley C. Barritt

customer_reviews.title: Realistic vacuum suction sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 2yr old niece who loves to mock her parents vacuuming. It sounds realistic. However, I wish it was easier for my niece to turn on by herself. But GREAT toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her vacuum. Plays with it cleaning the whole house for an extended period of time. Real sound.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter asked Santa for a pink vacuum. She absolutely loves it! The noise makes me a little crazy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Sound sound sound
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOD.... this is very cute and my loves it... but yes I HATE IT..:. I hate it.. I hate it... the sound it is making, oh my god.. it’s irritating. But some how my daughter is loving it and keeping it on all the time she is awake
customer_reviews.author: dave pitts

product_meta.title: Play Circle by Battat – Home Neat Home Pink Vacuum Cleaner Set – 2-in-1 Pretend Play House Cleaning Playset with Realistic Sounds and Hand-Held Toy Duster for Kids Ages 3 and Up (3 Pieces)
product_meta.description: The Play Circle Home Neat Home Vacuum set is a 2-in-1 pretend vacuum that makes cleaning up with mom or dad so much fun! This colorful plastic vacuum cleaner converts from an upright push vacuum to a removable hand-held “dust buster” and has a hose and nozzle for detailed work. Make the pretend-play much more REAL with realistic vacuum sounds and whirling beads. Pop out the removable dust cup and hear the beads shake as you pretend to empty it out. Toddlers will learn how to keep a tidy house while engaging in mirroring, learning, imaginative play, and developing fine motor skills. The size of the vacuum is perfect for small hands and the wheels let little cleaners easily push the vacuum around. This brightly colored pretend cleaner is a fantastic gift that provides different screen-free, role-play, and learning opportunities at a variety of ages and developmental stages.
feature_bullets: 2-in-1 pretend play vacuum cleaner sized perfectly for small hands and bigger imaginations!
Whirling beads and realistic vacuum sounds feels just like the real thing when rolling around the kitchen, rooms, and play areas.

The hand-held duster snaps into the upright vacuum for a variety of play options, and the dust cup full of swirling beads pops out so you can practice emptying it. But don’t worry – this pretend dust stays safely in the dust cup!
Includes: (1) upright toy vacuum cleaner, (1) pink hand-held duster, and (1) removable duster cup with “dust” beads.
Playing house teaches role play, develops fine motor skills, coordination, and encourages creativity.
Requires 3 x C batteries (not included). To clean surface of vacuum, use a damp cloth with a small amount of mild soap.
Not a functional vacuum, no bags or containers to empty or clean. To clean surface of vacuum, use a damp cloth with a small amount of mild soap.
Recommended for kids ages 3 and up. Convenient packaging makes it a great gift for the little helper in your life.
Made from recyclable plastics. All Play Circle products meet or exceed US and CAN safety standards.
Play Circle is manufactured by Battat, a family-owned toy company since 1897 providing a line of award-winning toys that encourage healthy development for all children.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
